name: Family (DDJ Demo)
description:
Created for Dream Diary Jam 2017.

This demo has you control Mother who, like others in her family, is unable to leave the house. So to pass the time, Mother heads up to her and Father's bedroom and dreams.

Three of the four worlds are accessible, 3 effects are available and fully implemented, and there are plenty of events to find. Think of this as an appetizer for the main course.

CONTENT WARNING FOR THIS GAME:

  • Flashing images
  • Loud or sudden audio
  • Minor gore/blood
  • Drowning
  • Flashing lights
  • Possible scopophobia
  • Body horror

All feedback is welcomed and you're allowed to livestream/let's play/review this game for compensation.
